item.title: Readings from TRUE Royalty: Celebrating Godâ€™s GOOD Design for Boys and Girls ft. Pastor Tim Stephens [LD INTERVIEWS] [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch [INTERVIEWS] ~ April 12, 2023
On this episode of the Dispatch, hosts Andrew DeBartolo and Matthew Hallick are joined by Pastor Tim Stephens to talk about his new ministry in public libraries and why pastors must show Drag Story Hour for the lie that it is and herald the truth of God's Word in the public square. 

Episode Resources: Fairview Baptist Church: https://www.fairviewbaptistchurch.ca/; Conference Website: https://kingandkingdom.ca/; Story Hour for Boys and Girls: http://www.fairviewbaptistchurch.ca/storyhour/;

item.title: The Woke War on Women [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ April 11, 2023
On this episode of the Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matty explore the woke war on women and its grizzly side effects.

[Segment 1] - Displacing Women: Women+ (aka. men) are the new spokesmen for women: Bud Light Stands Behind Dylan Mulvaney Partnership | NY Post: https://nypost.com/2023/04/03/bud-light-stands-behind-partnership-with-trans-activist-dylan-mulvaney;
Bud Light Exec Slammed after Mulvaney Fiasco | MEAWW: https://meaww.com/who-is-alissa-heinerscheid-woman-slammed-after-bud-light-dylan-mulvaney-fiasco;
Bud Light Sales Plunge after Mulvaney Endorsement | Washington Times: https://www.washingtontimes.com/news/2023/apr/11/bud-light-sales-down-after-partnership-with-transg/; 

MUST READ: Androgyny: The Pagan Sexual Ideal by Peter Jones: https://indexarticles.com/reference/journal-of-the-evangelical-theological-society/androgyny-the-pagan-sexual-ideal/; 

[Segment 2] - The attack on and erasure of women and feminity:
Billboard Chris Twitter: https://twitter.com/BillboardChris/status/1559194991586447361;

MUST READ: Irreversible Damage: The Transgender Craze Seducing Our Daughters: https://www.amazon.com/Irreversible-Damage-Transgender-Seducing-Daughters/dp/168451228X/ref=sr_1_1?keywords=irreversible+damage+book+by+abigail+shrier&sr=8-1;

[Segment 3] - The attack and erasure of women in sports:
Canadian Man Smashes Canadian Powerlifting Record in Protest | Western Standards: https://www.westernstandard.news/alberta/weight-what-man-smashes-canadian-female-powerlifting-record-in-protest-over-regulations/article_db8847e8-cf2f-11ed-91c8-932f5c87dccb.html
Riley Gaines Ambushed and Abused by Trans Activists | NY Post: https://nypost.com/2023/04/07/riley-gaines-ambushed-and-hit-after-womens-sports-speech-at-sfsu
Former Race Car Driver Accepted to Royal Academy of Dance Exam | Independent: https://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/home-news/former-racing-car-driver-transgender-ballet-dancer-pass-royal-academy-of-dance-ballet-sophie-rebecca-a7687481.html.

item.title: WORSHIP OR ELSE! - A New Religious War: Christianity vs. Trans Insanity [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ April 6, 2023
On this episode of the Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matty expose the new civic pagan cult religion: Transianity, and juxtapose it with the TRUE religion: Christianity.

[Segment 1] - The Trans Religion's New Law-code:
Ontario NDP proposed new LGBTQIA+ Blasphemy Laws | CBC News: https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/toronto/drag-performance-legal-protections-1.6800932; 
Calgary City Council Passes New Drag Protection Bill | CBC NEWS: https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/calgary/calgary-city-council-safety-bylaw-homophobic-protests-1.6779105;
The Queer Gnostic Cult: https://newdiscourses.com/2023/04/queer-gnostic-cult/;

MUST READ: Drag pedagogy: The playful practice of queer imagination in early childhood by Harper Keenan & Lil' Ms. Hot Mess: https://www.researchgate.net/publication/348772774_Drag_pedagogy_The_playful_practice_of_queer_imagination_in_early_childhood

[Segment 2] - Trans-Catechesis aka. Grooming Kids into Queerness:
Nobody is After Your Kids | Not the Bee: https://notthebee.com/article/nobody-is-after-your-kids;
Canada's New Drag Summer Camp Programme | Not the Bee: https://notthebee.com/article/heres-the-kind-of-programming-canada-spends-taxpayer-dollars-on;

[Segment 3] - Excommunicating All Those Who Will Not Bow to Transianity :
Fed-funded Drag Camp Targets Kids as Young as 7 | The Post Millenial: https://thepostmillennial.com/trudeau-government-sponsors-junior-drag-camp-targeting-children-7-11-years-old;
BC's New Gender Self ID | The Post Millenial: https://thepostmillennial.com/gender-self-id-for-children-as-young-as-12-passed-into-law-by-british-columbia;
Unhinged Trans Portester Violently Attack Billboard Chris | Rebel News: https://www.rebelnews.com/unhinged_trans_activists_mob_peaceful_protester_against_child_mutilation_at_trans_day_of_visibility_event_in_vancouver; 
Vancouver Cop Laughs at Billboard Christ After He Was Assaulted: https://twitter.com/DanDicksPFT/status/1641974932929384449;
Vancouver PD Investigating Assault | ChekNews: https://www.cheknews.ca/vancouver-police-investigating-violent-confrontations-at-trans-rights-rally-1147011.

item.title: A Maple Leaf Mafia Shakedown [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ April 4, 2023
On this episode of the Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matty reflect on the sad reality that Canada is under the mob-like thumb of political party tyranny, shadowy unelected bureaucrats, and special interest groups. Welcome to the Canadian Crime Family!

[Segment 1] - Medical Tyranny and Corruption:
RANDY HILLIER: Political Parties are like Crime Families | Bright Light News: https://brightlightnews.com/are-political-parties-crime-families-randy-hillier;
Falls Prophets Fall | Liberty Dispatch: https://rumble.com/v2egfcq-false-prophets-fall...or-will-they.html; 
Dr. Paul Marik: "I Can't Unsee it" | Bright Light News: https://brightlightnews.com/i-cant-unsee-it-dr-paul-marik; 
Government Led Medical Examination Survey | Rebel News: https://www.rebelnews.com/government_led_mobile_examination_survey_generates_criticism_online;
PHAC Privacy Protection Gone Awry| Rebel News: https://www.rebelnews.com/privacy_protection_is_awry_at_the_public_health_agency_of_canada;

[Segment 2] - MPs Shakedown their Constitutients to Line their Pockets: 
MP Pay Raise Hike | True North: https://tnc.news/2023/04/01/pay-raises-tax-hikes;
The Joke is on Canadian Taxpayers | Canadian Taxpayer Federation: https://tnc.news/2023/04/01/pay-raises-tax-hikes;
Fuel Charge Rates by Province | Government of Canada: https://www.canada.ca/en/department-finance/news/2021/12/fuel-charge-rates-for-listed-provinces-and-territories-for-2023-to-2030.html;

[Segment 3] - Government Set to Gag the Internet:
Bill C-11: https://www.parl.ca/DocumentViewer/en/44-1/bill/C-11/third-reading; 
House of Commons Passes Bill C-11 | Western Standard: https://www.westernstandard.news/news/watch-house-of-commons-passes-bill-c-11/article_38ca4ad0-cfd7-11ed-9e19-db40d186658e.html;
Why the Senate Should Send Bill C-11 Back to the House Again | Michael Geist: https://www.michaelgeist.ca/2023/04/why-the-senate-should-restore-the-user-content-amendment-and-send-bill-c-11-back-to-the-house-of-commons;
Bill C-11 Explained | CBC NEWS: https://www.cbc.ca/news/entertainment/bill-c-11-explained-1.6759878.
